dict.acceptation: 满足，满意，舒服；妥善处理；（债务的）清偿；（伤害的）赔偿；

sent.orig: Implement employee satisfaction survey, and follow up action, dedicate to continuous increase employee satisfaction rate.
sent.trans: 执行员工满意度调查，并跟进行动计划，致力于不断提供员工满意度。

sent.orig: As system-level maximizes the overall satisfaction degree function, each discipline can acquire optimum satisfaction solutions, simultaneously.
sent.trans: 系统级在满足一致性约束的同时，最大化综合满意度方程，使所有学科同时获得最满意的优化解。

sent.orig: She has more satisfaction in achieving her goals more than satisfaction in fine cloths and luxuries.
sent.trans: 达成她的目标比物质享受更让她觉得满足。

sent.orig: Enterpriser satisfaction is an internal motive and customer satisfaction is an external force.
sent.trans: es是内在动力源泉，而CS是外部作用力量。

sent.orig: Someone's life is a lump of desires. Without satisfaction it pains with satisfaction it becomes dull.
sent.trans: 有些人的生命是团欲望，不能满足便痛苦，满足便无聊。
